RainbruRPG::Server::TechNoteDialog

RainbruRPG::Server::TechNoteDialog Class Reference

#include <technotedialog.h>

Collaboration diagram for RainbruRPG::Server::TechNoteDialog:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The RainbruRPG server configuration dialog.

It is only the graphic part of the server configuration. The data are stored in a ServerConfiguration instance.

We must pass a ServerConfiguration pointer in the constructor to be able to modify it.

The defaults values are DEFAULT_SERVER_PORT for the port and DEFAULT_MAX_CLIENTS for the max client.
